title: Large-Scale Advanced Mathematics Problem-Solving Competency Program Utilizing AI-Based Chat Tools

context.prior_knowledge: College-level foundational mathematics knowledge (vectors, calculus, probability theory, etc.)
context.additional_context: Implementation of a personalized learning support structure using AI tools in individual BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments.

learning_goals: Learners can apply strategies to decompose complex mathematical problems step-by-step using AI chat tools.
Learners can solve three-dimensional geometry problems based on AI feedback in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can write reports analyzing and evaluating real-world applications of mathematical concepts using generative AI.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
